front.title: Problem Statement and Requirement: Protocol between Mobile Access Point and Terminal

abstract.t: This document discusses the problem and requirement of the communication protocol between mobile access point and terminal. With the evolution of mobile communication, there are various kind of wireless communication technologies such as GSM, GPRS, WCDMA, LTE, WLAN, WiMAX, and TDS-CDMA et al. Each of these wireless communication has independent connection, mobility and configuration management. This document would like converge all these function into a common ground especially in the environment of multiple connections.
